title: Raani Haar: The Indradhanush Necklace - A Symphony of Colors and Craftsmanship
materials: Glass Beads. Finished with a Hyderabadi Polish for enduring luster.
features: This Raani Haar reimagines traditional grandeur with a contemporary twist. The design features cascading strands of meticulously strung glass beads in a harmonious blend of blues and pinks, creating an 'Indradhanush' (rainbow) effect. The central motif boasts a captivating Zambian Emerald surrounded by Polki diamonds and lustrous freshwater pearls, intricately designed like a blooming flower. Delicate gold accents with enamel work (Minakari) enhance the floral and peacock (Mayura) motifs. The tassels are adorned with semi-precious gemstones in tear-drop shapes, finished with gold caps.
colors: Dominant colors are Blue and Pink
accented by the lush green of the Emerald
the brilliance of the Polki diamonds
and the colorful gemstones in hues of purple
occasions: and cultural events. This statement piece adds a touch of regal elegance to any traditional or contemporary attire. Suitable for Muhurtham ceremonies and other auspicious occasions.
description: A unique fusion of traditional Raani Haar design and modern aesthetics. The stunning gemstone combination, meticulous craftsmanship, and vibrant color palette make it a true statement piece. It is a modern heirloon. This necklace is not just jewelry; it is a piece of art that embodies the rich cultural heritage of Hyderabad and South India.
